title: ZSS Gajapati Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Various Part Time Yoga Instructor Post
description: Zilla Swasthya Samiti Gajapati (ZSS Gajapati) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Yoga Instructor Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post-Graduation Diploma can grab this chance and apply for the ZSS Gajapati Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
